mapper.select: LOAD DATA LOCAL INFILE #{parameter} IGNORE INTO TABLE tf_loan_unionpay_check_bill_details FIELDS TERMINATED BY '`' IGNORE 1 LINES SET platform_id = TRIM( TRAILING ',' FROM platform_id ), platform_name = TRIM( TRAILING ',' FROM platform_name ) , bank_name = TRIM( TRAILING ',' FROM bank_name ) , bank_org_no = TRIM( TRAILING ',' FROM bank_org_no ) , bill_date = TRIM( TRAILING ',' FROM bill_date ) , platform_order_no = TRIM( TRAILING ',' FROM platform_order_no ) , system_order_no = TRIM( TRAILING ',' FROM system_order_no ) , tread_type = TRIM( TRAILING ',' FROM tread_type ) , tread_status = TRIM( TRAILING ',' FROM tread_status ) , tread_create_time = TRIM( TRAILING ',' FROM tread_create_time ) , tread_compelete_time = TRIM( TRAILING ',' FROM tread_compelete_time ) , initiator_name = TRIM( TRAILING ',' FROM initiator_name ) , initiator_account = TRIM( TRAILING ',' FROM initiator_account ) , payee_name = TRIM( TRAILING ',' FROM payee_name ) , payee_account = TRIM( TRAILING ',' FROM payee_account ) , order_money = TRIM( TRAILING ',' FROM order_money ) , platform_fee_money = TRIM( TRAILING ',' FROM platform_fee_money )
